analyzed: ae kotta ri ka sta ba /

original: bod skad du /

original: gcig las 'phros pa'i bstod pa /
analyzed: gcig las 'phros pa'i bstod pa /

original: 'phags pa 'jam dpal la phyag 'tshal lo //
analyzed: 'phags pa 'jam dpal la phyag 'tshal lo //
translated: Homage to the noble Ma√±ju≈õrƒ´.

original: chos gcig la ni mngon dgyes shing //
analyzed: chos gcig la ni mngon dgyes shing //
translated: Delighting in a single Dharma,

original: nags su gcig pur bzhugs pa dang // 'jig rten rnams kyi mig gcig gyur //
analyzed: nags su gcig pur bzhugs pa dang // 'jig rten rnams kyi mig gcig gyur //
translated: Dwelling alone in the forest, becoming the eye of the world,

original: 'jig rten mig gcig phyag 'tshal lo //
analyzed: 'jig rten mig gcig phyag 'tshal lo //
translated: Homage to the one eye of the world.

original: rkang gnyis rnams kyi mchog gyur pa //
analyzed: rkang gnyis rnams kyi mchog gyur pa //
translated: Becoming the supreme of bipeds,

original: bden pa gnyis ni rnam par bsgoms //
analyzed: bden pa gnyis ni rnam par bsgoms //
translated: Meditating on the two truths,

original: grogs gnyis pa ni mi mnga' ba //
analyzed: grogs gnyis pa ni mi mnga' ba //
translated: Not having a second companion,

original: gnyis med gsung la phyag 'tshal lo //
analyzed: gnyis med gsung la phyag 'tshal lo //
translated: Homage to the one with non-dual speech.

original: ting 'dzin gsum dang ldan pa dang // dkon mchog gsum po cha mnyam zhing //
analyzed: ting 'dzin gsum dang ldan pa dang // dkon mchog gsum po cha mnyam zhing //
translated: Endowed with the three samƒÅdhis, equal to the three jewels,

original: sdug bsngal gsum gyi chu las rgal //
analyzed: sdug bsngal gsum gyi chu las rgal //
translated: Crossing over the waters of the three sufferings,

original: 'jig rten gsum 'tsho phyag 'tshal lo //üîΩbstan pa rnam pa bzhi po dang // bsam gtan bzhi yi rnam pa can //
analyzed: 'jig rten gsum 'tsho phyag 'tshal lo // bstan pa rnam pa bzhi po dang // bsam gtan bzhi yi rnam pa can //
translated: Homage to the one who sustains the three worlds.üîΩPossessing the four aspects of the teachings, having the four dhyƒÅnas,

original: sbyor ba bzhi dang rnam bral ba //
analyzed: sbyor ba bzhi dang rnam bral ba //
translated: Free from the four attachments,

original: bden bzhi mkhyen la phyag 'tshal lo //üîΩphung po lnga yi chags bral zhing //üîΩdbang po lnga ni rnam par bsgoms //
analyzed: bden bzhi mkhyen la phyag 'tshal lo // phung po lnga yi chags bral zhing // dbang po lnga ni rnam par bsgoms //
translated: Homage to the one who knows the four truths.üîΩFree from attachment to the five aggregates,üîΩMeditating on the five faculties,

original: yan lag lnga dang rnam bral ba //
analyzed: yan lag lnga dang rnam bral ba //
translated: Free from the five branches,

original: 'gro lnga gcod la phyag 'tshal lo //üîΩdbang drug chu bo la gnas shing //
analyzed: 'gro lnga gcod la phyag 'tshal lo // dbang drug chu bo la gnas shing //
translated: Homage to the one who severs the five destinies.üîΩAbiding in the river of the six sense bases,

original: rgyun drug la ni rnam par gnas //
analyzed: rgyun drug la ni rnam par gnas //
translated: Dwelling in the six streams,

original: pha rol phyin drug yongs su rdzogs //
analyzed: pha rol phyin drug yongs su rdzogs //
translated: Perfecting the six perfections,

original: mngon shes drug la phyag 'tshal lo //
analyzed: mngon shes drug la phyag 'tshal lo //
translated: Homage to the one with the six higher knowledges.

original: byang chub yan lag rin chen bdun //
analyzed: byang chub yan lag rin chen bdun //
translated: The seven precious branches of enlightenment,

original: 'phags pa'i nor bdun stsol ba po //
analyzed: 'phags pa'i nor bdun stsol ba po //
translated: The bestower of the seven noble riches,

original: yan lag bdun dang rnam bral ba //
analyzed: yan lag bdun dang rnam bral ba //
translated: Free from the seven limbs,

original: srid bdun gtso la phyag 'tshal lo //üîΩyan lag brgyad las byung ba yi //
analyzed: srid bdun gtso la phyag 'tshal lo // yan lag brgyad las byung ba yi //
translated: Homage to the chief of the seven existences.üîΩThe one who teaches the eight persons

original: gang zag brgyad ni ston mdzad cing //
analyzed: gang zag brgyad ni ston mdzad cing //
translated: Who arise from the eight branches,

original: @102b 'jig rten chos brgyad spangs pa po //
analyzed: @102b 'jig rten chos brgyad spangs pa po //
translated: Abandoning the eight worldly dharmas,

original: mi khom brgyad 'joms phyag 'tshal lo //üîΩgnas dgu'i chags las rnam grol zhing //
analyzed: mi khom brgyad 'joms phyag 'tshal lo // gnas dgu'i chags las rnam grol zhing //
translated: Homage to the one who conquers the eight unfavorable states.üîΩLiberated from attachment to the nine abodes,

original: khong khro dgu ni rnam par spangs //
analyzed: khong khro dgu ni rnam par spangs //
translated: Abandoning the nine kinds of anger,

original: shin tu sbyangs pa dgu brnyes pa //
analyzed: shin tu sbyangs pa dgu brnyes pa //
translated: You have attained the ninefold ease of body and mind.

original: sa dgu mkhyen la phyag 'tshal lo //
analyzed: sa dgu mkhyen la phyag 'tshal lo //
translated: Homage to you, who know the nine levels!

original: 'phags pa'i dge 'dun bcu chos can ;
analyzed: 'phags pa'i dge 'dun bcu chos can ;
translated: You are the tenth of the noble Sangha,

original: / sgrib pa bcu ni gcod par mdzad //
analyzed: / sgrib pa bcu ni gcod par mdzad //
translated: you have cut through the ten obscurations.

original: 'phags pa'i gnas bcu la dgyes pa //
analyzed: 'phags pa'i gnas bcu la dgyes pa //
translated: You delight in the ten noble abodes.

original: stobs bcu ldan la phyag 'tshal lo //
analyzed: stobs bcu ldan la phyag 'tshal lo //
translated: Homage to you, who possess the ten powers!

original: de ltar 'phags pa stobs bcu ldan la tshig gis mchod pa'i phyir //
analyzed: de ltar 'phags pa stobs bcu ldan la tshig gis mchod pa'i phyir //
translated: Thus, in order to praise with words the noble one who possesses the ten powers,

original: bstod pas der ni bdag gis dge ba'i rtsa ba gang thob pa //
analyzed: bstod pas der ni bdag gis dge ba'i rtsa ba gang thob pa //
translated: whatever roots of virtue I have obtained here,

original: des 'dir dmyal dang yi dags dud 'gro'i sdug bsngal gyis khyab pa'i //
analyzed: des 'dir dmyal dang yi dags dud 'gro'i sdug bsngal gyis khyab pa'i //
translated: may they become the cause for this world, pervaded by the sufferings of hell beings, pretas, and animals,üîΩto cross over the ocean of existence.

original: 'gro ba srid pa'i rgya mtsho las ni rgal ba'i rgyur gyur cig / gcig las 'phros pa'i bstod pa slob dpon ma ti tsi tas mdzad pa rdzogs so//
analyzed: 'gro ba srid pa'i rgya mtsho las ni rgal ba'i rgyur gyur cig / gcig las 'phros pa'i bstod pa slob dpon ma ti tsi tas mdzad pa rdzogs so//
translated: The praise composed by Master Mati-Citta is complete.
